sentences.en: Do as you're told and don't give me any hassle!
sentences.cn: 叫你怎麽做就怎麽做,别跟我多嘴!

sentences.en: He doesn't want the hassle all over again.
sentences.cn: 他不想再惹这种麻烦了。

sentences.en: I don’t feel like cooking tonight, it’s too much hassle.
sentences.cn: 今天晚上我不想做饭，太麻烦了。

sentences.en: I don't think it's worth the money or the hassle.
sentences.cn: 我认为不值得为此花费那么多金钱和精力。

sentences.en: I had another salary hassle today with Miss Anne Miller Whitman.
sentences.cn: 今天我又因为薪水的事和安妮米勒温特曼吵起来了.

sentences.en: I have decided what to do, please do not give me any hassle about it.
sentences.cn: 我已经决定怎么做, 你用不着跟我唠叨.

sentences.en: It was a real hassle to apply for the insurance money.
sentences.cn: 申请保险金实在是一件麻烦事.

sentences.en: It's a real hassle to get this child to eat.
sentences.cn: 使这孩子吃东西,真要费九牛二虎之力.

sentences.en: It's a totally hassle - free process management for busy clients like yourself.
sentences.cn: 整个过程的管理完全无须您劳心费神,繁忙如您,即可安心专注于您自身的业务.

sentences.en: It’s such a hassle not having a washing machine.
Products that meet goals with the minimum of hassle and intrusion seem almost magical to users.
sentences.cn: 对用户来说,产品实现目标并只受到最小的侵扰几乎是魔术般的.

sentences.en: Rupert and Carla had a little hassle and went home.
sentences.cn: 鲁珀特和卡拉发生了点口角回家了.

sentences.en: Send them an email—it's a lot less hassle than phoning.
sentences.cn: 给他们发个电邮吧，这比打电话省事多了。

sentences.en: Stop hassling me! I said I’ll call them tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 别烦我了！我说过明天会给他们打电话的。

sentences.en: The secretary told me no man would hassle her boss.
sentences.cn: 那位秘书告诉我那会儿谁也不能打扰她的老板.

sentences.en: Then my husband started hassling me.
sentences.cn: 然后我丈夫便开始不停地烦我。

sentences.en: There wouldn't be any hassle about any discontinuance of services.
sentences.cn: 人类中断服务,任何激烈的争论就会消声匿迹了.

sentences.en: Thirdly, catalogues are a hassle free means of purchasing beads beaded items.
sentences.cn: 第三, 按商品目录购买珠子和珠宝首饰会省去麻烦.

sentences.en: Weddings are so much hassle that you need a good break afterwards.
sentences.cn: 婚礼真是件折腾人的事，办完后得好好休息才行。

words.tran_cn: 找麻烦，搅扰；与…争辩；使…烦恼

trans.tran_cn: 困难的事情，麻烦的事情，争论
trans.tran_en: something that is annoying, because it causes problems or is difficult to do

trans.tran_cn: 找麻烦，搅扰；与…争辩；使…烦恼
trans.tran_en: If someone hassles you, they cause problems for you, often by repeatedly telling you or asking you to do something, in an annoying way

trans.tran_cn: 不断烦扰，与…争辩，使…烦恼

trans.tran_en: to annoy someone, especially by asking them many times to do something
